ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (10:59): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: Converting between HTML and XML in the toolchain doesn't seem like a good solution in that situation, since the conversion is lossy (in both directions) - e.g. you can't write a web crawler that parses HTML then stores it in an XML database to do a load of querying on the data, because the translation will destroy some of the data
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (10:59): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: That's a problem called "being human" which economists have difficulty with
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (10:59): ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c: The conclusion seems to be that storing things in an XML datatbase is not a good idea
